      • setFullContent

        public void setFullContent(java.lang.String filePath)
                    throws ReadingException
        Parses all the files needed for reading book. This method must be called before calling readSection method.
        Parameters:
        filePath -
        Throws:
        ReadingException

      • setFullContentWithProgress

        public int setFullContentWithProgress(java.lang.String filePath)
                               throws ReadingException
        Does the same job with setFullContent but also tries to load saved progress if found any. If no progress file is found then it'll work the same as setFullContent does.
        Parameters:
        filePath -
        Returns:
        saved page index. 0 if no progress is found.
        Throws:
        ReadingException

      • readSection

        public BookSection readSection(int index)
                        throws ReadingException,
                               OutOfPagesException
        Main method that splits and gets the parts of the book.
        Parameters:
        index -
        Returns:
        Throws:
        ReadingException
        OutOfPagesException - if index is greater than the page count.
